Losing has never felt this good.
I think I discovered something new about myself.
I don't think I've ever had an orgasm like that.
Sorry if I made a mess.
I feel just as tired as I do after a tough fight.
I'll take a shower as soon as the game is over.
After I take a shower, I think I'll go eat something. Does anybody wanna come?
Sometimes I surprise even myself.
I don't care that Juri just saw me masturbate. It still felt amazing.
I'm sorry Mahiru, but I'm gonna have to confiscate your camera after the game. I can't risk it falling into Juri's hands.
Please, don't share those pictures, Mahiru... But just out of curiousity, how do I look?
Sure, Marinette. This isn't the way I normally do it, but I'd gladly teach you the.. other part.
No thanks, I think I'll pass.
I'm ready for a rematch whenever you are.
Congratulations, ~name~! When are we gonna have a rematch?
That was a great game, ~name~. I hope I get the chance to face you again.
I lost, but I still had a great time. In that way, I feel like a winner.
Even though I lost, I think I learned a lot today. Thank you, everyonel!
J-Juri? Are you feeling ok?
What? That's the first time you call me by my name...
WHAT?! No, Juri, wait!
Wait, Juri! Please!
Oh great, Morrigan won. Congratulations I guess.
Congratulations, Mika! You've come a long way!

text.content: A few days later...
It's an old temple.
Chun-Li asked you to come here, but she didn't tell you why.
~name~, thank you for coming.
I wasn't sure if you were gonna show up.
I wanted you to come here because I have a favor to ask you.
Ever since I played strip poker, I've had a feeling that there's something I've been missing in my life.
That's why I want to have a rematch with you.
However, I want it to be on my terms.
Chun-Li goes to the corner. What's she doing?
Wait... Is she taking her clothes off?
~name~, if you don't mind, I want you to fight me naked.
I could not possibly ask my fighter friends, so I'm asking you.
I need to know if it feels any different than fighting...well, dressed.
Don't worry. I promise I'll go easy on you.
Here I go!
Even though she says she'll hold back, Chun-Li seems to go at you with all she has.
You barely manage to dodge her kicks.
Looks like you've no choice but to take the offensive if you want to survive.
Somehow, you grab Chun-Li from behind in an awkward way.
Wait, what are you doing?!
~name~!
If you touch me there I think I'm gonna...
I'm gonna...!
Ahhhhhhhhh!!!
Well, it looks like my question has been answered.
Thank you, ~name~.
A few days later...
This place doesn't look very safe.
Looks like it was a bad idea to cut through here.
Suddenly, two men appear around the corner.
They push you against the wall.
This isn't your lucky day, pal. Hand over your wallet.
One of them pulls out a gun.
Hurry up! Unless you want a bullet in your head.
Hold it right there, you punks!!!
A woman's voice is heard from the top of the stairs.
You recognize that voice.
You heard it just a few days ago.
It's Chun-Li!
The two assailants don't look scared at all.
This doesn't concern you, bitch. Get the fuck out of here, or we'll hurt you too.
In the blink of an eye, Chun-Li is in front of them.
She kicks the man with the gun in the head so hard that he drops it inmediately.
Then she delivers a strong punch to the other man's jaw.
They both fall to the ground, unconscious after just one hit each.
Shortly after, a police car stops by to take the two men into custody.
Are you sure you're ok, ~name~?
I guess you are lucky that I passed through here on my nightly workout route.
You don't need to thank me. I would've done the same for anyone.
Although, there's one thing you can do for me.
Ever since we played strip poker together, I've developed a sensation I can't get rid of.
Whenever I remember how exciting it was to do what I did, I can hardly contain myself.
Look how wet I am, just from meeting you here today.
You understand what I want, right?
Thank you, ~name~.
Let's do it right here. It'll be more exciting.
Fuck me, ~name~!
Come on, harder!
Ooooh!!!
Just like that!
Keep going!
I can't last much longer!
Oooooh, I'm gonna cum!
AAAAAHHHHHHH!!!
Thank you, ~name~. That was perfect.
Now, are you ready for round 2?
